Reviews.Title: “Great!”
Reviews.Author: SaraSukor Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: stayed easter sunday weekend price offered lower youth hostels barcelona liked quiet touristy gaudi park 20 minute walk close 35 stops metro direction hotel website metro detailed walking bit looking hotel name putxet street map metro 2 huge single beds flat screen tv english channels

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: designsbykari
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel nights tour 6th floor view city location okay access metro easily tourist sites dropped front hotel due narrow roads haul luggage hill main road meals served buffet style lot choices bathroom little dated repair overall comfortable lobby beautiful space lots sit relax

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel outside the city area”
Reviews.Author: loveducks
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel contiki tour coach able park outside hotel narrow roads dropped main road drag luggage 1015mins uphill hotel roads leading hotel narrow luggage wheels definately advantage hotel chain hotels decent size family hotel staying lifts wouldnt fit 2 people 4 luggages carrying luggage 4th floor decent size decor clean bed proper twin size bed theres space actually luggage theres wooden assume luggage ours floor theres writing desk useful tv sits english channel following world news kettle cups provided plastic cups provided provided plus mini fridge safe cupboard safe pay 5euro day 50euro deposit reception lock valuables luggage flooring wooden adds cleaniness bathroom isnt theres bidet shower bathroom tiny light entry shower dim makes creepy taking shower window bathroom slightly hear bathroom door closed windows advise barcelona nearest metro station hotel 20mins walk 2030mins city single trip ticket 150euro

Reviews.Title: “I would not give more than 2 stars!”
Reviews.Author: UmutAYildiz
Reviews.Content: worst hotel stayed deceived 4 star category quality 2 star hotel booked double arrive double construction phase besides august terribly fridge cold drinks surely fridge arrogant receptionist surely fridge written booking confirmation twin apparently fridge twin worse accept fridge real priority anyway guell park everyday attraction metro takes 1015 min reach

Reviews.Title: “Average hotel that's too far away”
Reviews.Author: Grahamc84
Reviews.Content: checkin staff rude unfriendly hotel dull nightlife paper walls bathroom spacious clean tv spanish except sky news positive hotel hills spent time hotel city bar dead empty hotel lifeless view wall bins inspiring expensive 3 nights

Reviews.Title: “quite well”
Reviews.Author: travellinaRM
Reviews.Content: hotel cheap maybe stars little tooo 3 night hotel reaching center bc connected transports breackfast dinners foods differences attention quality services instead staff nice

Reviews.Title: “The worst hotel ever”
Reviews.Author: IheartNYC25
Reviews.Content: worst hotel stayed arrived shower bath started filling plug wasnt looked properly realised doing hair stuck drains clumps hair shower walls id 2030 hairs clump speak manager told switch shower didnt issues dirty floors left hotel werent tour contiki im surprised contiki choose stay hotel tour hotels except hotel id 1 5 3 5 promised tour hotel city centre guess thats pay

Reviews.Title: “Inexpensive, far from the metro, the hotel needs renovation”
Reviews.Author: ussmax
Reviews.Content: hotel disposed quiet metro station green route 1015 minutes walk minuses evening return hills difficult safe pay bath worn water flowed shower weak poor sound isolation heard door close water neighbors pluses relatively inexpensive distance park guell 15 minutes walk quiet cultured neighborhood cleanly

Reviews.Title: “Clean and quiet hotel. Location...not so good.”
Reviews.Author: StarBrigt7
Reviews.Content: traveled barcelona meditteranean tour werent responsible choosing hotel hotels stayed trip largest cleanest bathrooms ive spent chunk time barcelona past hotel clean quiet helpful staff wished closer subway station wifi running youre planning traveling via subway arent relying hotels internet services stay hotel otherwise elsewhere

Reviews.Title: “Quiet Hotel in Quiet Location.”
Reviews.Author: aaSilverFox
Reviews.Content: hotel quiet location sometimes hard bcn adequate bfast 7 euros bad suffer 2 power cuts whilst freak people elevator time free wifi throughout hotel blessing overall stay 2 days change broken fridge

Reviews.Title: “Haha, 4 star? No way”
Reviews.Author: GaborLondon
Reviews.Content: worst experience stay hotel am fussy choosy person time life change hotel fall asleep night luggage compartment fairly clean spotless bathroom cleaner expected 4 star hotel laughing 4 star granted hotel hotel guests hotel time arrived hotel empty quickly paid lot hotel sleep realized main entrance huge sliding noise unbearable guests sat main entrance lobby noisy literally 2 metres window sliding door closed feel bed vibrating unluckily door closed 510 otherwise corridor inside busy door sound proof understand easily people talking 10 metres door time volcano ash air wasnt able fly home sleepless night waiting confirmation flight cancelled finally found hotel met written tried changes reception hardly english speaker receptionist refused check help switch refused refund night spend hotel receptionist totally respect didnt listen inquiry finally 30 minutes arguing money moved guy absolutely mean rude hope gonna fired suitable role politeness helpfulness unfortunately staff missed qualities warmly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value!”
Reviews.Author: LucasLondon_UK
Reviews.Content: booking via tourist office main railway station stuck spain due volcanic eruptions despite 4 stars eur 60 beds 4 people 2 queen beds advantage facilities checking bit difficult inundated bookings due cheap fare bookings handle touch hotel directed guest straight successfully hotel clean value hotel close park guell useful price little complain

Reviews.Title: “Good Place To Stay for a budget”
Reviews.Author: worldtravellers123
Reviews.Content: half decent stay barcelona 05 2007 value location cleanliness amenities bed bathroom shower service edit review delete review review hotel park putxet hotel located putxet barcelona spain stayed tour company called contiki 2007 decent hotel nice elevators walking distance local metro ramblas town centre lots tourists 10 minutes hotel close parc guell lovely view city height clean abit found left bread bread crumbs sheets im overall average 4 star hotel walls thin hear contiki talking drinking hallway bathroom stylish modern complimentary toiletries including toothbrush shoe horn shower cap shower bath tub reason plug hole couldnt run bath water immediately drain staff ok speaking english lady particular attitude didnt stay hotel night actual price night 200 euros night dont bother overall bad stay reconsider locations centre city single people tight budget

Reviews.Title: “Not recommended”
Reviews.Author: cw1706
Reviews.Content: stayed week november university field trip disappointed hotel firstly beds missing half leg calling reception fit air conditioning unit hot air winter warm time forced sleep windows woken single night 4am bins emptied half hour hotel unbelievable noisy day cockroach crawl sink despite clean recommend hotel alongside barcelonas main attractions
